content: I'm having to refresh Zulip in my browser a lot especially when open up implementers stream. Is this annoyance happening for others. I have plenty of bandwidth btw.
I had that a couple of months ago. A re-boot seemed to help
re-boot? (is the web version not the desktop app)
ok just cleared all the unread messages and see what that does
is there a way for unreads to be automatically cleared after a time period ( 1 month ) ?
